messages.subject: come visit Chicago!
messages.msgSnippet: I read all the invites to Pittsburgh and Ohio and wanted to extend an invitation to anyone who may be in the Chicago area and would like to stop in.  We are
messages.messageBody:
I read all the invites to Pittsburgh and Ohio and wanted to extend an
invitation to anyone who may be in the Chicago area and would like to stop
in. We are about an hour west of Chicago but very near the train line (I
could provide transportation to or from the station) There are also some
things to do out in this part of the state. We have a guest room with a
Queen size bed, a pull out couch in the FR, and a futon in the basement plus
lots of floor space for sleeping bags. For the outdoorsy types you could
also "camp" in our gazebo in the backyard!

Beth in Illinois
